left.title: Adverts Campaigns Managing system
left.description: Developed an advanced adverts playlist generator system for Baltic Ground Services. Generated adverts queue is currently displayed on one of TV devices in Vilnius Airport. The system helps managing advert campaigns and generates playlists every day depending on each advert length and timing settings, such as how many times per hour or per day an advert must be shown, accepts more complex settings, such as which hours exactly an advert should be shown, which day of the week, etc. The project was developed with PHP.
